name: Honey Red Garlic Wings

ingredients.name: all purpose flour or corn starch

preparation: Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner. Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
In large bowl, sprinkle chicken with 4 tbsp Red Garlic Topper and all the flour; toss to coat.
Arrange in single layer on Sheet Pan Liner; roast, turning over halfway through, until deep golden and crispy, 1 hour.
Place hot wings back in (clean) bowl; drizzle with honey and sprinkle with remaining 1 tbsp Topper. Toss to coat.
Serve with your favourite dip or aioli, if desired.
tips: For better browning, use 2 Sheet Pans. Roast in top and bottom thirds of oven; switch racks halfway through roasting.
